title: Spinoza for Hire: The Six-Book Spinoza/Huntress Boxed Set
description: The complete Spinoza saga, including the original Spinoza trilogy and the spin-off Huntress trilogy, along with "The Vampire on the Train" short story!Spinoza is a private investigator who specializes in finding the missing. He's good at what he does. Damn good. But he's also a recovering alcoholic and a royal mess. Hired to find a missing teenager, Spinoza won't let his personal demons—or demons of any kind—get in the way of finding the truth. And the truth is stranger than fiction...and far more deadly. And so begins The Vampire With the Dragon Tattoo...Included in the boxed "The Spinoza Trilogy" by J.R. RainTHE VAMPIRE WITH THE DRAGON TATTOOTHE VAMPIRE WHO PLAYED DEADTHE VAMPIRE IN THE IRON MASK"The Huntress Trilogy" by Chanel THE VAMPIRE WITH THE GOLDEN GUNTHE VAMPIRE IN THE HIGH CASTLETHE VAMPIRE WHO KNEW TOO MUCHAlong with "The Vampire on the Train" short story by J.R. Rain!
author: J.R. Rain
